page.title: 04RECREATION IN WHEATHAMPSTEAD
page.content: In Wheathampstead, people do a variety of leisure activies such as Bingo,keep fit classes and the Youth Club. In the summer holidays we have a play scheme. At the play scheme we play Cricket,Football,Manhunt and Rounders.Every Wednesday we go swimming with the play scheme.The play scheme is only there for four weeks. The nearest Cinema to us is the Odeon in St.Albans. It costs Â£1.50 to get in for children and Â£2.50 for adults. In the playing field they football and on the Common they play cricket.The nearst swimming pool is in St.Albans.Sometimes they get the jumping castle. it start in the morning till 12.00 and starts again after lunch till about 5.00.
